reviewText: Powerful messages of reformation for the maturing child of God by members of the Father's Heart apostolic council.
You Never cease to amaze me God! Totally Amazing Conference .I don't think I have heard a better one.

All 5 meetings were powerful and enlightening.  I'm still in awe of the revelation that flows with so little effort, and I'm drawn more and more by the Goodness of God, while receiving a greater understanding about divine purpose in those God has given me.  It seems every week God is sending me into new territory, whether it's meeting with church leadership across this region or simply holding the hand and crying with a man who is truly sorry he'd hurt his wife.  The teaching in these videos did something to me and I pray they will do something to you.  They gave me much more than I could ever give back.

BTW: There is a 15 minute highlight film of this series, on Dr. Hanby's website- http://yourquantumlife.com/video/highlights-from-fathers-heart-multi-generational-gathering-2014/

I highly recommend purchasing the series!
